Tests that baseline alignment adjustments only affect the line the new character was placed on.

TestBaselineAdjustmentWhenNotUsingFontSizeAsHeight()

Tests that baseline alignment adjustments are done correctly on a builder which has TextBuilder.useFontSizeAsHeight disabled, and only affect the line the new character was placed on.

public void TestBaselineAdjustmentWhenNotUsingFontSizeAsHeight()
